# Roleplay Rule 2 ## Avoid misusing in-character text chat.
- Do not use in-character (IC) chat for [color=red]out-of-character (OOC) communication[/color]. - Avoid explicitly mentioning [color=yellow]game mechanics[/color] in IC chat. - Keep all IC communication [color=green]immersive[/color] and relevant to the roleplay setting.
[italic][color=green]Maintain the separation between IC and OOC to preserve immersion and fair play.[/color][/italic]
